title: MacOS Developer
jobDescription:
This role will be part of a team that develops software that runs on over 100k computers worldwide, measuring panelists activities as they surf the Internet. Using a software meter that is optimized to be unintrusive to the user, yet able to gather many biometric data points and send them back to a collection system that runs in the Cloud.

The Software Engineer is ultimately responsible for delivering technical solutions: starting from the project's onboard until post launch support and including development, testing and user acceptance. It is expected to work with multiple delocalized project teams in multiple regions. As the MacOS SW Engineer you will participate in the development efforts for our industry leading, MacOS based meters. Your role will involve implementing, and maintaining robust, scalable solutions. You will play a key role in shaping the technical direction of our projects.

Responsibilities

Meter Deployment:

  • Build new features in the existing MacOS software meter.

CI/CD Implementation:

  • Leverage CI/CD pipelines for automated build, test, and deployment processes.
  • Ensure continuous integration and delivery of features, improvements, and bug fixes.

Code Quality and Best Practices:

  • Adhere to coding standards, best practices, and design principles.
  • Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to maintain high code quality.

Performance Optimization:

  • Assist in the Identification of performance bottlenecks in both client-side and data upload components.
  • Optimize applications for remote/unassisted installation.

Team Collaboration:

  • Follow best practices.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure a cohesive and unified approach to software development.

Security and Compliance:

  • Implement security best practices for both client and upload components.
  • Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations related to web application security.

Key Skills

  • Bachelor's or Masters degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
  • Proven experience, minimum 2 years, in Client-side development expertise using Objective C, Swift, XCode
  • Good understanding of CI/CD principles and tools. GitLab a plus
  • Good problem-solving and debugging skills.
  • Good communication and collaboration skills with ability to communicate technical concepts
  • Utilizes team collaboration to contribute to innovative solutions efficiently

Other desirable skills

  • Knowledge of networking principles and security best practices.
  • Knowledge of Browser extensions distributed via Google and/or Microsoft stores
  • Experience writing automaton tests

title: PLSQL Developer - Pune/Mumbai -Clover Infotech
tagsAndSkills: PLSQL,Plsql Oracle,Plsql Development,Plsql Programming,pl sql,Oracle 11G,Oracle 10G,Oracle Forms
jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities -

  • Strong Experience in creating PL/SQL Packages, Procedures, Functions, Triggers, Views and Exception handling for retrieving, manipulating, checking and migrating complex data sets in Oracle 10G, 11G, 12C and 19C
  • Expertise in SQL and PL/SQL programming, developing complex code units.
  • Experience in data migration/conversation using SQL*Loader.
  • Experience in Data Migration using import and export.
  • Expertise in creating the indexes on tables and partitioning the table for SQL tuning purposes.
  • Responsible for performance-tuning activities in the project.
  • Creating complex views, materialized views on multiple tables as per customer requirements.
  • Use PL/SQL Tables, Cursors to process huge volumes of data and used bulk collect for mass updates as a performance improvement process.
  • Ability to write complex SQL queries for reporting purposes.
  • Support the users of the application by using multiple SQL and PL SQL techniques.
  • Providing technical assistance, problem resolution and troubleshooting support.
  • Should have good experience in Client Interaction and Presentation Skills

title: Android Developer
jobDescription:
• We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Android/AndroidTV/FireTV App Developer to join our development team.
  • As a Senior Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality Android and AndroidTV/FireTV applications.
  • You will work closely with cross-functional teams, including designers and product managers, to create innovative and user-friendly applications.
  • Develop and maintain advanced Android and AndroidTV/FireTV applications in Kotlin. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices.
  • Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in Android and AndroidTV/FireTV app development and propose innovative solutions.
  • Ensure app quality by conducting code reviews, writing unit tests, and implementing effective debugging and testing strategies.
  • Optimize app performance, ensuring smooth and responsive user experiences on various devices.
  • Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.


Minimum Qualifications Required:

  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
  • Minimum of 6 years of professional experience in Android and AndroidTV/FireTV app development.
  • Proficiency in Kotlin programming languages.
  • Strong knowledge of Android SDK, Android Studio, and related tools. Knowledge of Jetpack compose is added advantage.
  • Experience developing and deploying apps on the Google Play Store and Solid understanding of Android UI/UX guidelines and best practices.
  • Strong knowledge of Android and AndroidTV frameworks, APIs, and development tools. Solid understanding of object-oriented programming and design patterns.
  • Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaborative development workflows. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Strong communication and teamwork abilities & d emonstrated ability to work in a fast-paced, agile environment.
  • Experience with Android app development and Android TV development, including leanback support and TV-specific UI considerations.
  • Experience in integrating Analytics platforms like (Google Analytics, Firebase, etc)
  • Experience in developing media apps serving Live and VOD content types Hands on experience in VideoPlayer (Exo Player) or 3rd party like Bitmovin/JW Player Familiarity with backend technologies and RESTful APIs.
  • Experience with cloud-based technologies and services (e.g., Firebase, AWS) & Knowledge on in-app purchase and subscriptions in Android PlayStore
